name: Staff
summary: All staff members. Note, this role is assigned based on employment status and should not be directly assigned.

name: Employee
summary: All W-2 staff. Note, this role is assigned based on employment status and should not be directly assigned.

name: Contractor
summary: All 1099 staff. Note, this role is assigned based on employment status and should not be directly assigned.

name: Board of Directors
summary: Appoints and monitors the Chief Executive Officer and the general health of the Company.

name: Board Member
summary: Serves on the Board of Directors

name: Chairman of the Board
summary: Chairs meetings of the Board of Directors.

name: Senior Management
summary: A high level management position. Senior management is expected have expertise within their own domain, as well as strong general knowledge of general Company processes across all departments.

name: Executive Officer
summary: Executive Officers wield executive decision making power.

name: Executive Vice President
summary: Executive Officers wield executive decision making power.

name: Senior Vice President
summary: The most senior, non-executive manager.

name: Chief Executive Officer
summary: The highest ranking company executive with final responsibility for major strategic decisions and management of operation and corporate resources. Acts as primary contact between the Board of Directors and corporate operations. The CEO is also the "public face" of the company.

name: President
summary: Oversees critical business operations.

name: Chief Operating Officer
summary: Senior executive overseeing all day-to-day non-technical operational corporate functions.

name: General Manager
summary: Senior manager overseeing (non-consumer/non-client) internal, partner, and other 3rd party relationships, as well as overall company policy/processes and corporate expenses.

name: Chief Technical Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of technical implementation and operations.

name: Head of Research & Development
summary: Oversees implementation of software products.

name: Head of Technical Operations
summary: Oversees all technical implementation/devops.

name: Chief Financial Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of corporate accounting records and strategic finance.

name: Corporate Controller
summary: Senior manager with direct responsibility for the corporate accounts and books. Oversees all payables and receivables. Conducts internal financial audits and is the primary contact for external financial auditors.

name: Accountant
summary: Responsible for maintaining Company financial records.

name: Chief Revenue Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of revenue generation.

name: Chief Marketing Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of brand management, corporate and product messaging.

name: Head of Marketing
summary: Senior manager in charge marketing, brand management, and messaging.

name: Head of Finance
summary: Senior manager in charge financial matters.

name: Training Manager
summary: Responsible for development and implementation of client training curriculum.

name: Chief Sales Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of corporate sales strategy and oversight of the sales team.

name: Head of Sales
summary: Senior manager in charge of all sales.

name: Sales
summary: Responsible for directly selling to potential clients.

name: Head of Integrations
summary: Oversees all integrations with third-parties.

name: Integrations Manager
summary: Oversees integrations of Company services/products with third-party partners. Works directly with partners during the integration process.

name: Head of Implementations
summary: Oversees all client implementations.

name: Implementations Manager
summary: Oversees implementation of Company services/products with clients. Works directly with clients and with the client's assigned Account Manager during the implementation process.

name: Account Manager
summary: The Account Manager is an operational role acting as the primary technical contact for clients and partners. The Account Manager supports internal sales and technical support teams.

name: Chief Administrative Officer
summary: Senior executive in charge of corporate administration, including human resources and legal matters.

name: Head of Administration
summary: Senior manager in charge of corporate administration, including human resources and legal matters.

name: Business Administrator
summary: Business admin for a department or region

name: Head of Human Resources
summary: Oversees and has final responsibility on HR matters.

name: Human Resources Manager
summary: Managers human resoruces agents and handles elevated cases directly.

name: Human Resources Agent
summary: Oversees personnel management and compliance.

name: Product Manager
summary: Responsible for coordinating stakeholder input and managing product specification and setting development priorities.

name: UI Designer
summary: Produces style guidelines, graphic/UI assets, mockups, and similar artifacts to guide and support implementation of front-end user interface.

name: Brand Manager
summary: Manages brand assets and usage along with setting and enforcing policy regarding corporate messaging and identity.

name: Social Media Coordinator
summary: Responsible for developing and implementing overall social media strategy inline with brand and product messaging and target demographics.

name: Regional Marketing Manager
summary: Oversees implementation of corporate marketing campaigns. Develops and oversees implementation of local campaigns.

name: Business Analyst
summary: Searches and and secures new lines of business, channels, and partners.

name: Head of Business Development
summary: Manages overall business development strategy.

name: Software Engineer
summary: Qualified to modify and review [qual] software code. Sensitive changes must be reviewed by a Senior Software Engineer prior to being deployed.

name: Software Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes to sensitive [qual] code.

name: Software Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for production [qual] code.; A Lead Software Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

name: Database Engineer
summary: Qualified to modify, review, and manage [qual] database schemas and DBMSs.

name: Database Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] schemas and DBMSs.

name: Database Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for production schemas and DBMSs.; A Lead Database Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

name: Host Engineer
summary: Qualified to configure and management of [qual] hosts systems.

name: Host Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to approve changes to production [qual] host systems.

name: Host Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for production host systems.; Head Host Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving host security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

name: DevOps Engineer
summary: Maintains and supports the CI/CD pipeline and other development and operational tools.

name: DevOps Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes to production networks.

name: DevOps Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for the CI/CD pipeline.

name: Network Engineer
summary: Qualified to configure and manage Company networks.

name: Network Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes to production networks.

name: Network Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for the integrity and security of production networks.; Lead Network Engineer approval is required for changes to sensitive networks providing access to private customer data, under regulatory scrutiny, or any change of exceptional complexity.

name: Cloud Engineer
summary: Qualified to configure and manage [qual] cloud services.

name: Cloud Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] cloud services.

name: Cloud Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for production cloud services systems.; Head Cloud Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving cloud services security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

name: Quality Engineer
summary: Qualified to ascertain correctness and conformance of Company products.

name: Quality Engineer, Senior
summary: Qualified to review and approve changes [qual] quality systems.

name: Quality Engineer, Lead
summary: Has final responsibility for quality assurance.

name: Project Manager
summary: Responsible for working with implementation product management to optimize implementation with regard to efficiency and stakeholder priorities.

name: Customer Service Agent
summary: Responsible for handling of customer service requests.

name: Customer Service Manager
summary: Oversees Customer Service Agents. Sensitive issues of particular complexity or involving particularly high value customers may be referred to the Customer Service Manager.

name: Head of Customer Service
summary: Oversees all of customer service operations.

name: In House Counsel
summary: Oversees legal matters, agreements, and advises Company on [qual] matters.

name: Policy Engineer
summary: Manages and develops Company policy definition and implementation. Also works on verification, evidence gathering and compliance.

name: Policy Engineer, Lead
summary: Leads the Company's internal policy development, implementation, and verification.

name: Security Officer
summary: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to Company security.

name: Compliance Officer
summary: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to compliance and Company Policy in general.

name: Privacy Officer
summary: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to customer and staff privacy.

name: Head of Security, Compliance, & Privacy
summary: Oversees administrative aspects of security, compliance, and customer privacy.

name: Key Admin
notes: The designation is generally applied to Executives, Compliance Agents, and/or domain Chiefs or Seniors. Sufficient backups should be provided such that a Key Manager is available at all times for all key types.
summary: Responsible for managing one or more Company keys involved in critical operations or sensitive access.

name: Access Manager
summary: Oversees access configurations and manages user accounts for sensitive systems.

name: Staff Account Manager
summary: Manages general staff accounts and business access.

name: Projects Technical Adiminstrator
summary: Manages technical components of the project management infrastructure.

name: Operational Admin
summary: Has full access to sensitive operational services. May be designated for emergency and/or backup purposes.

name: Network Alert Responder
summary: Responsible for receiving and evaluating network alerts.

name: Badge Manager
summary: Badge Managers oversee issuing and tracking visitor badges.; Sufficient backups should be designated such that a Badge Manager is always available at each physical location.

name: Sensitive Data Handler
summary: Qualified to deal with sensitive data such as card holder data, social security numbers, or other information that requires special handling.

name: VPN Manager
summary: Manages the company's centralized VPN services.

name: Senior Management Team
summary: Annually reviews Company compliance and key processes.

name: Vendor Management Team
summary: Maintains and enforces procedures to ensure that important vendor and product information is properly maintained on an ongoing basis.

name: Incident Response Team
summary: Members are on call to respond to significant incidents

name: Department Heads
summary: Heads a company department. Genarally, non-executive personell report dircetly or indirectly to a department head and collectively the department heads should encompass all company staff with the exception of the CEO and the Department Heads themselves.

name: Change Control Board
summary: Reviews proposed changes and assigns priorities in accordance with cost and strategic priorities.

name: IT Personnel
summary: Any individual working within a technical capacity within the company.

name: Head of Security & Compliance
summary: Oversees general security and compliance, including safeguarding customer and client data.

name: Outside Counsel
summary: Legal counsel hired by and directly reporting to the Board of Directors.

name: External Auditors
summary: Perform financial audits and report directly to the Board of Directors.

name: Financial Analyst
summary: General finance analysis.

name: Marketing Administrator
summary: Oversees general marketing process and logistics.

name: Marketing Analyst
summary: Analyzes marketing data to determine effectiveness of marketing campaigns and recommends strategies for future campaigns.

name: Sales Consultant
summary: Analyzes and recommends sales opportunities.

name: Security Consultant
Description: Provides as needed analysis, support, and implementation of security and compliance related matters.

name: Internal IT
summary: Supports internal IT infrastructure, end user programs, etc.

name: Internal IT, Lead
summary: Leads internal IT infrastructure support team.

name: Office Administrator
summary: Completes clerical and administrative tasks for an office. Their main duties include welcoming and directing visitors, coordinating meetings and appointments and performing clerical tasks, like answering phones and responding to emails.

name: Database Consultant
summary: Provides general support and implements task relating to database operations and management.

name: Subject Matter Expert
summary: Provides expert knowledge and guidance on the subject of [qual].

name: Recruiter
summary: Recruits new talent to the team.
